data.name: KeepUp Survival - Tropical Island Map
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains:

A small tropical island for relaxing evenings. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

Geschichte:


Your thirst for adventure had given you and your twin sister the idea to travel the seas. During a big storm, you capsized at sea. The container ship sank and you lost sight of each other. The only thing you can remember is that you and others were driven by the sea to another island. As far as you can remember, this island was called "Lost Island" and was known for its diseases. Within a few days, many people on this island became sick and died, animals mutated into large creatures. No one wanted to come to the aid of these people. Your memories tell you that you should be at Tropical Island.

A detailed and exciting world will keep you enthralled and expectantly impressed.

This product requires the Steam version of the main game KeepUp Survival to play.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 4GB or better
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: Blood is displayed when killing an animal or character.
